Konec meseca Ledeno kraljestvo 2
Vrača se kraljestvo Arendelle s slovitimi junaki. Strokovnjaki napovedujejo dobro zgodbo in rekorde.
07 Nov 2019, 08:13 by E. B.



Pred šestimi leti je Ledeno kraljestvo podiralo rekorde.



Oboževalci se veselijo novih dogodivščin.


Mineva šest let od premiere Ledenega kraljestva, ki se je v zgodovino kinematografije in Disneyja zapisalo kot ena največjih filmskih uspešnic vseh časov. Vesela novica za oboževalce je, da konec meseca prihaja drugi del, ki bo po napovedih postregel z novo izvirno in napeto zgodbo ter novimi rekordi.
1 milijardo evrov je iztržil prvi del.
Spomnimo, Ledeno kraljestvo je novembra 2013 že po par dneh predvajanja potrdilo, da gre za Disneyjev najprivlačnejši izdelek. V treh dneh je po kinodvoranah zaslužilo vrtoglavih 50 milijonov evrov, po petih pa že skoraj 90 in tako za seboj pustilo celo takrat nadvse priljubljene Igre lakote. Da je pravi fenomen, so potrdili končni znesek, ki je presegel milijardo in Ledeno kraljestvo ponesel na 15. mesto na seznamu najuspešnejših filmov vseh časov, oskar za najboljši animirani film in skladbo, dva grammyja in številne druge laskave nagrade, ki so kar klicale k nadaljevanju, a so to uradno potrdili šele po več kot dveh letih ugibanja in premlevanja. Šest let je, tudi za nestrpne oboževalce, roko na srce, minilo hitro, ne nazadnje so se največji privrženci kratkočasili s preštevilnimi ponovitvami prvega filma in dvema kratkima filmoma, s katerima so spretni producentje poskrbeli, da med čakanjem na drugi del nihče ne pozabi na priljubljene ledene junake, njihov humor, prijateljstvo in napete dogodivščine.
Iskali bodo izvor moči
Napočil je čas, da se vrnemo v kraljestvo Arendelle in, seveda, skočimo v neznano. Kot obljublja napovednik, se bosta sestri Elza in Ana skupaj s Krištofom, Olafom in Svenom podali na nevarno potovanje globoko v gozd, na katerem bodo odkrivali izvor Elzinih čarobnih moči, s katerimi bodo rešili kraljestvo. Če se je kraljica v prvem delu bala svojih nadnaravnih sposobnosti, bo v drugem trepetala, ali jih ima dovolj, skratka, obeta se nova avantura, ki bo z najrazličnejšimi posebnimi učinki nedvomno pričarala pravi spektakel in zanesljivo napolnila blagajne, Kristen Bell (Ana), Idina Menzel (Elza), Jonathan Groff (Krištof), Josh Gad (Olaf) in Santino Fontana (Hans) pa bodo nedvomno očarali z duhovitimi dialogi in nepozabnimi skladbami. Sloviti zasedbi se bo pridružilo še več zvezdnikov, ki bodo posodili glas novim junakom, denimo Evan Rachel Wood, Alfred Molina in Sterling K. Brown. Režija bo znova v rokah Jennifer Lee in Chrisa Bucka, producent bo Peter del Vecho, Leejevi pa se je pri pisanju scenarija tokrat pridružila Allison Schroeder.

End of month Ice Kingdom 2
The kingdom of Arendelle returns with famous heroes. Experts predict a good story and records.
07 Nov 2019, 08:13 by E. B.



Six years ago, the Ice Kingdom broke records.



Fans are looking forward to new adventures.


It's been six years since the premiere of Ice Kingdom, which went down in cinema and Disney history as one of the greatest movie hits of all time. The happy news for fans is that at the end of the month comes the second installment, which is expected to feature a new original and tense story and new records.
The first part of the € 1 billion was paid.
Recall that in November 2013, after a few days of play, the Ice Kingdom confirmed that it was Disney's most attractive product. In three days, it earned a staggering € 50 million after movie theaters, leaving almost 90 in five, leaving behind the then-popular Hunger Games. That it was a true phenomenon was confirmed by a final amount in excess of 1 billion, bringing the Ice Kingdom to 15th place in the list of the most successful films of all time, an Academy Award for best animated film and song, two Grammys and many other flattering awards that called for continued, but they only officially confirmed it after more than two years of guessing and grounding. Six years, even for eager fans, the hand-to-heart passed quickly, not least the biggest followers fell short with numerous reruns of the first film and two short films that kept the producers awake while waiting for the second part. popular ice heroes, their humor, friendship and tense adventures.
They will look for a source of power
It is time to return to the Arendelle kingdom and, of course, jump into the unknown. As the announcer promises, the sisters Elza and Ana, along with Christopher, Olaf and Sven, will embark on a dangerous journey deep into the forest, discovering the origin of Elsa's magical powers to save the kingdom. If, in the first part, the Queen feared her supernatural abilities, in the second she would tremble, or had enough, in short, a new adventure was promised, which, with a variety of special effects, would surely conjure up the true spectacle and reliably fill the coffers, Kristen Bell (Ana). Idina Menzel (Elza), Jonathan Groff (Christopher), Josh Gad (Olaf) and Santino Fontana (Hans) will no doubt be enthralled with witty dialogues and unforgettable songs. The famed cast will be joined by more celebrities who lend voice to new characters such as Evan Rachel Wood, Alfred Molina and Sterling K. Brown. The director will once again be in the hands of Jennifer Lee and Chris Buck, the producer will be Peter del Vecho, and Lee will be joined by Allison Schroeder when writing the script.
